lead_paragraph: In a rebuttal of his predecessor’s leadership style, Mr. Turnbull said the awards of knights and dames were “not appropriate in our modern honors system.”

headline.main: Malcolm Turnbull Ends Use of Titles of Knights and Dames in Australia
headline.print_headline: Malcolm Turnbull Ends Australian Ranking System

snippet: In a rebuttal of his predecessor’s leadership style, Mr. Turnbull said the awards of knights and dames were “not appropriate in our modern honors system.”

keywords.value: Elizabeth II, Queen of Great Britain
